product.title: Demons Happened
product.description: Demons Happened is a challenging top down shooter with puzzle/platforming elements. Play as a ghost who looks as dead on the outside as he is on the inside, making demons your weapons on a journey to fix your tv.
product.history: I started developing Demons Happened as a hobby project in 2016. For questionable reasons I decided to build my own engine, which resulted in a 6 years adventure that I'm extremely proud of... with a LOT of learnings. The idea stemmed when I first started learning about game development, finding funny how the only difference between the player object and the enemies is just in what controls them.

features.feature: Control your enemies to overcome your obstacles
8 enemies with vastly different skills, from ricocheting bullets to time stopping
More than 100 bite-size levels, a mix of action, puzzle, and skillful dodging
A protagonist dead inside AND outside
